snippet: Tony Stewart will miss the start of his final Nascar season after fracturing his back Sunday in an accident on an all-terrain vehicle.
abstract: Tony Stewart fractures his back in all-terrain vehicle accident and will miss start of his final Nascar season.
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart will miss the start of his final Nascar season after fracturing his back Sunday in an accident on an all-terrain vehicle.
